title: Child Craft Stella 3 Drawer Dresser, Gentle Gray
features: 3 spacious drawers provide generous storage space
Round brushed gold metal knobs and quality ball bearing drawer glides highlight each drawer
Crafted of pine, MDF, and plywood drawer boxes for durable, long LASTING construction
Anti-tip kit securely attaches dresser to the wall for added safety
description: The Art Deco inspired design of the Child Craft Stella 3-Drawer Dresser will bring a touch of elegance and class to your nursery or bedroom. The beaded detailing and the gracefully turned legs enhance the dresser's sophisticated style, providing you a functional, yet beautiful piece of furniture. The round brushed gold metal knobs highlight the 3 spacious drawers which provide generous storage space. Available in Child Craft Matte white and Gentle Gray non-toxic, baby-safe finishes, The Stella 3-Drawer Dresser pairs perfectly with other items from the Stella collection, creating a chic and polished look for your baby's nursery.
